# NSF-Senegal Project

## Balance Table & Summary Statistics

Below are the baseline reports. All variables and their descriptions are in the variable description tab.

### Variable Selection

\<

| Variable | Description |
|------------------------------------|------------------------------------|
| hhid_village | Village ID |
| hhid | Household ID |
| trained_hh | Trained household |
| hh_age_h | Household head age |
| hh_education_level_bin_h | Indicator for household head with secondary education or higher (1=Yes, 0=No) |
| hh_education_skills_5_h | Indicator that household head is literate (1=Yes, 0=No) |
| hh_gender_h | Household head gender (1=Male, 0=Female) |
| hh_numero | Household size |
| hh_03\\\_ | Indicator for those who worked in domestic agricultural activities in the past 12 months (1=Yes, 0=No) † |
| hh_10\\\_ | Average weekly hours spent within 1 meter of surface water source, in the past 12 months |
| hh_12_6\\\_ | Indicator for those who harvested aquatic vegetation, among those who spent time near a water source in the past 12 months (1=Yes, 0=No) |
| hh_16\\\_ | Average weekly hours spent producing, purchasing, or applying fertilizer in the past 12 months (among those near a water source) |
| hh_15_2 | Indicator for making fertilizer (compost) among those who spent time near a water source (1=Yes, 0=No) |
| hh_26\\\_ | Indicator if currently enrolled in formal school (1=Yes, 0=No, asked about children) † |
| hh_27\\\_ | Indicator if attended non-formal school or training? (1=Yes, 0=No, asked about children) † |
| hh_29_01 | Indicator for primary level education (1=Yes, 0=No, asked about children) |
| hh_29_02 | Indicator for secondary middle level education (1=Yes, 0=No, asked about children) |
| hh_29_03 | Indicator for secondary higher level education (1=Yes, 0=No, asked about children) |
| hh_29_04 | Indicator for upper secondary education (1=Yes, 0=No, asked about children) |
| hh_31_bin | Indicator if student completed studies or moved to next class for 2022/2023 (1=Yes, 0=No, asked about children) |
| hh_37\\\_ | Indicator if missed \\\>1 consecutive week of school due to illness in the past 12 months (1=Yes, 0=No, asked about children) † |
| hh_38\\\_ | Number of attended school days in the past week (asked about children) |
| living_01_bin | Indicator for selected tap water as main drinking source (1=Yes, 0=No) |
| game_A_total | Total paid for Game A (CFA) |
| game_B_total | Total paid for Game B (CFA) |
| TLU | Tropical livestock units |
| agri_6_15 | Number of cultivated plots |
| agri_6_32_bin | Indicator if used any organic fertilizer (1=Yes, 0=No) |
| agri_6_36_bin | Indicator if used any inorganic/chemical fertilizer (1=Yes, 0=No) |
| total_land_ha | Total land cultivated (hectares) |
| agri_6_34_comp_any | Used any compost on any parcel (1=Yes, 0=No) † |
| agri_income_01 | Indicator if engaged in paid agricultural work in last 12 months (1=Yes, 0=No) † |
| agri_income_05 | Amount received for agricultural work (FCFA), among those who responded yes to working in agriculture |
| beliefs_01_bin | Probability of contracting bilharzia (1=Strongly agree/Agree) + |
| beliefs_02_bin | Probability of household member contracting bilharzia (1=Yes, 0=No) + |
| beliefs_03_bin | Probability of a child contracting bilharzia (1=Yes, 0=No) + |
| beliefs_04_bin | Agree: Village land should belong to community (1=Yes, 0=No) + |
| beliefs_05_bin | Agree: Village water sources should belong to community (1=Yes, 0=No) + |
| beliefs_06_bin | Agree: Right to products from own land (1=Yes, 0=No) + |
| beliefs_07_bin | Agree: Right to products from community land worked on (1=Yes, 0=No) + |
| beliefs_08_bin | Agree: Right to products from community water sources fished in (1=Yes, 0=No) + |
| beliefs_09_bin | Agree: Right to products from community water sources harvested from (1=Yes, 0=No) + |
| health_5_3_bin | Indicator for bilharzia or diarrhea in the past 12 months (1=Yes, 0=No, among those reporting illness) |
| health_5_6\\\_ | Indicator for Diagnosed with schistosomiasis (1=Yes, 0=No) † |
| num_water_access_points | Number of village water access points |
| q_51 | Distance to nearest healthcare center (km) \\\[village level\\\] |
| target_village | Indicator if auction village (1=Yes, 0=No) |
